products.title: Stirlo Stone Beige
products.metadescription: Made to Measure Stirlo Stone Beige Roller Blind | Privacy, Dim-Out Fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Stirlo Stone Beige Plain Roller Blind The Stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room.  The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If   the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.

products.title: Burst Beige Roller Blind
products.metadescription: The Burst Beige colour is perfect for matching in with magnolia walls and rooms of a neutral tone. The dimout and moisture resistant qualities of these blinds only adds to their appeal. These are our most popular dimout blinds and it's easy to see why
products.productdescription: The Burst Beige colour is perfect for matching in with magnolia walls and rooms of a neutral tone. The dimout and moisture resistant qualities of these blinds only adds to their appeal. These are our most popular dimout blinds and it's easy to see why - use this blind in your home to shade and give yourself privacy.  Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric. Just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. These blinds are moisture resistant too so can be installed in a kitchen or bathroom. Fed up of the sun spoiling your view of the telly? Install this dimout blind and stop the glare from ruinning your favourite show.  All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Konya Blackout Putty Beige
products.metadescription: Made to Measure Konya Blackout Putty Beige Roller Blind | Privacy, Thermal Fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Konya Blackout Putty Beige Plain Roller Blind The Konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester, with a PVC blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.

products.title: Amor Beige Roller Blind
products.metadescription: The Amor Beige colour is perfect for matching in with magnolia walls and rooms of a neutral tone. The blackout and moisture resistant qualities of these blinds only adds to their appeal. These are our most popular blackout blinds and it's easy to see w
products.productdescription: The Amor Beige colour is perfect for matching in with magnolia walls and rooms of a neutral tone. The blackout and moisture resistant qualities of these blinds only adds to their appeal. These are our most popular blackout blinds and it's easy to see why - use this blind in your bedroom to block out the early summer sun.  Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.  All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Dorset Sand Roller Blind
products.metadescription: With it's fun seaside themed pattern, the Dorset Sand roller blind is perfect for anyone living by the coast or who loves the beach. The seaside theme consists of all the usual suspects, like a lighthouse, lobster, starfish and the odd troublesome seag
products.productdescription: With it's fun seaside themed pattern, the Dorset Sand roller blind is perfect for anyone living by the coast or who loves the beach. The seaside theme consists of all the usual suspects, like a lighthouse, lobster, starfish and the odd troublesome seagull.  Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  This blind can be made upto 280cm wide - much wider than most paterned roller blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Woven Parchment Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Woven Parchment Roller Blind
products.productdescription: With is textured finish, this blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality.  With the woven fabric texture on the front of this blind, you can add a literal touch of class to your windows.  Being a dimout fabric makes this blind perfect for kitchens, bathrooms and living rooms where you need privacy, but don't want to block all of the light.

products.title: Amor Beige with Haze Pure Double Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Amor Beige with Haze Pure Double Roller Blind Combining two of our most popular roller blinds in one, this Amor Beige and Haze pure double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds. Keep the voile down in the day for light and privacy, then at night
products.productdescription: Combining two of our most popular roller blinds in one, this Amor Beige and Haze pure double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds. Keep the voile down in the day for light and privacy, then at night lower the blackout Amor soft grey to block out the light.  Our double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice. Lower the voile fabric to give your home the daytime privacy you require. Gently filtering the light and preventing people from seeing in, this blind is ideal for those who don't want to be overlooked.
